sections.heading: or endowment policies; provisions required
sections.text: No policy of life or endowment insurance, except policies of industrial insurance, shall be issued or delivered in this state unless it contains in substance the following provisions:(1) A provision that all premiums shall be payable in advance either at th

sections.heading: constitutional. State ex rel. Martin v. Howard, 96 Neb. 278, 147 N.W. 689 (1914).
